name: Kings vs. Queens (TriJam#185)
description:
TriJam#185: Kings and Queens "Imagine she were a plant, then I'd wish I were a Zombie."
- The Black King

No plants. No Zombies. Just Kings and Queens.
Oh... and Rooks, Knights, Bishops, Pawns and a lot of fun!

I had the idea for this jam and wanted it to come alive! This week, there may be some bugs in the game, it was just not enough time! I hope you enjoy it and post your Highscores for the live stream!

Please leave a comment after voting - Feedback is the most important information source after a jam!

Enjoy

Gris & Team
